resources.string: Binocle
ApiCall Detail
Refresh
Warning! there is less than 10% power left!
This activity will display a warning if the device is not plugged and if there is less than 10percent power left in battery.
The force is strong here, as Dalvik is near.
This activity will display a warning if the device is localised near (100 km) Dalvik.
Current latitude is %f
Current longitude is %f
Dalvik is %d km away
Your device is recognized as a: %s
Secret file can only be decoded on the device it has been created on. Current ANDROID_ID is %s.
Encrypt secret
Decrypt secret
Secret have been encrypted on disk using ANDROID_ID. Current ANDROID_ID is %s.
An error occurred when encrypting secret!
Secret have been correctly decrypted from disk! secret message was:\n %s
An error occurred when decrypting secret!
This activity is waiting for an activation code over SMS. To activate it, you need to send an SMS containing the string "666".
Waiting for SMS with activation code...
SMS received, activation code is valid!
